mapper.insert: insert into board_table (boardTitle, boardWriter, boardContents, fileAttached, thumbnailAttached) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached}, #{thumbnailAttached})
insert into board_file_table(originalFilesName, storedFilesName, boardId) values (#{originalFilesName}, #{storedFilesName}, #{boardId})
insert into board_thumbnail_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
